Articles.Content:
KSP version 1.0.5, Windows 8.1 64-bit.

This is an absolutely fresh clean install, no mods. I double-click KSP.exe, and then Windows freezes. i can move my mouse, but cannot click on anything/close windows or anything. The only thing I can do is ctrl-alt-del and end the KSP task. If I try double-clicking the launcher, I get a blank window that pops up for a moment, then freezes exactly as before. I have tried running both as administrator with no luck. Originally, this one was on a manual install. I deleted everything, and downloaded the installer version and ran that. Same results.

Im presuming your using 32 bit KSP? Is this a new machine or an older one maybe recently having Windows put back on it? Are all your drivers up to date? Have you checked Device Manager to check all is well there?

Just a few things that popped into my head.
